00048 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00049 // Function: lookForwardMatch()
00050 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00051 bool VLNVContentMatcher::lookForwardMatch(QString const& text)
00052 {
00053     return enumerateMatches(text, 0);
00054 }

00056 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00057 // Function: fillWithContent()
00058 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00059 bool VLNVContentMatcher::fillWithContent(QString const& text, LineContentAssistWidget& assist,
00060                                          int& startIndex, QString& /*toolTipText*/, int& /*toolTipIndex*/)
00061 {
00062     startIndex = 0;
00063     bool ret = enumerateMatches(text, &assist);
00064     assist.sortItems();
00065     return ret;
00066 }
00067 
00068 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00069 // Function: enumerateMatches()
00070 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00071 bool VLNVContentMatcher::enumerateMatches(QString const& text, LineContentAssistWidget* assist) const
00072 {
00073     QRegExp exp("^" + text.toLower() + ".*");
00074 
00075     int count = 0;
00076     bool exactMatch = false;
00077 
00078     if (m_item != 0)
00079     {
00080         // Go through all the children and try to match with their names.
00081         for (int i = 0; i < m_item->getNumberOfChildren(); ++i)
00082         {
00083             LibraryItem const* child = m_item->child(i);
00084 
00085             if (child->getName().toLower().contains(exp))
00086             {
00087                 if (assist != 0)
00088                 {
00089                     assist->addItem(new QListWidgetItem(child->getName()));
00090                 }
00091 
00092                 ++count;
00093 
00094                 if (!exactMatch && child->getName() == text)
00095                 {
00096                     exactMatch = true;
00097                 }
00098             }
00099         }
00100     }
00101 
00102     return (count > 1 || (count == 1 && !exactMatch));
00103 }
